```text
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal storage at position(-29.5, -57.5)
Consists of a chest at position (-29.5, -57.5)

### Copper plate production at position (-28.0, -59.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner inserter at (-29.5, -58.5) that inserts into the chest at (-29.5, -57.5)
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Stone furnace at (-28.0, -59.0)
- Burner inserter at (-30.5, -59.5)

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting the wrong item from a furnace
-  Ensure that the furnace contains the item you are trying to extract. In this case, the agent was trying to extract `copper-plate` from a stone furnace that only contained `copper-ore`. Copper ore needs to be smelted into copper plates first.

# NAMESPACE
```
